amendment.description: To make available funds for certain transportation programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 358 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 21. Record Vote Number: 79.

action.text: Amendment SA 358 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S4254-4256) To make available funds for certain transportation programs.
